org.jacp.api.action

Interface IAction<A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - defines the type of message
    A - defines the type of ActionEvent
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FXAction

    public interface IAction<A,M>
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents an action used by specific listener. An Action targets a component and contains a message; every target get a specific instance of an action (clone) containing only his specific message and action event.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
